sentences.en: All adult males will be liable for conscription.
sentences.cn: 所有成年男子都有义务应征入伍。

sentences.en: Any pitcher is liable to crack during a tight game.
sentences.cn: 任何投手在紧张的比赛中都可能会失常.

sentences.en: He is liable for the fault of his son.
sentences.cn: 他应该为他儿子的过失负责.

sentences.en: Offenders will be liable to a seven-year prison term.
One who works under the hot sun is liable to sunstroke.
sentences.cn: 在炎热的阳光底下工作很容易引起中暑.

sentences.en: People are liable to judge others from their own first impressions.
sentences.cn: 人们容易用他们自己的最初印象来评价别人.

sentences.en: People who walk on the grass are liable to a fine.
She will grow into a woman particularly liable to depression.
sentences.cn: 她将变成一个特别易于消沉的女人。

sentences.en: Such a figure is liable to be attacked as a blasphemer.
sentences.cn: 这样的人很容易被人抨击为亵渎神明。

sentences.en: Tenants are jointly and severally liable for payment of the rent.
sentences.cn: 租金由承租人共同且分别承担。

sentences.en: Tenants remain liable if they pass on their lease.
sentences.cn: 如果房客将房子转租，他们仍承担责任。

sentences.en: The Act states that anyone committing the offence is liable to imprisonment.
sentences.cn: 这一法案规定任何犯下此罪的人都有可能被监禁.

sentences.en: The airline's insurer is liable for damages to the victims' families.
sentences.cn: 航空公司投保的保险公司为遇难者家庭的损失负法律责任。

sentences.en: The car is liable to overheat on long trips.
sentences.cn: 这辆汽车跑长途容易过热。

sentences.en: We are all liable to make mistakes when we're tired.
sentences.cn: 我们疲劳的时候都容易出错.

sentences.en: You know you are liable to be cross-examined mercilessly about the assault.
sentences.cn: 你要清楚他们可能会就这起人身侵犯案毫不留情地盘问你。

sentences.en: You will be liable for any damage caused.
sentences.cn: 你必须对造成的任何损失负赔偿责任。

sentences.en: You're liable to get cold if you are not careful.
sentences.cn: 你若不当心就有可能感冒.

trans.tran_cn: 有责任的，有义务的，有…倾向的，易…的
trans.tran_en: legally responsible for the cost of something
